title: Sonoma Valley
name: Prohibition Spirits
content: The only spirits producer in Sonoma Valley. Prohibition went on the map with their HelloCello limoncello. Now they produce bourbon, rye, whiskey, rum and other treats. Sometimes they are open on the weekends on a whim, but call ahead for a tour and tasting. They make a bourbon called "Hooker's House," while the sexy label says one thing, it's actually named after General Hooker (no, the term "hooker" did not come from his name!).
